titleStmt.title: Christmas in & out or, our Lord & Saviour Christs birth-day.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.H. for Francis Coles, and are to be sold at his shop in the Old-Bayly,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Decemb. 6: 1652"; the '3' in imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Dedication on title page, in verse: To the Reader. Good Joshua once ordain'd a Holy-Day, ... Remember him that doth remember thee. Thine John Taylor.
